definition: to emit a sound/(of birds, insects etc) to chirp, hoot etc/(of a siren, steam whistle etc) to sound
to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
to shout/to call/to order/to ask/to be called/by (indicates agent in the passive mood)

sentences.english: A flock of cawing ravens had just flown up from in front of her.
sentences.chinese: 一群呱呱鸣叫的乌鸦从她面前飞起。

sentences.english: Then we relaxed and enjoyed our lunch to the sound of screeching sea birds and crashing waves.
sentences.chinese: 然后自在地在海鸟尖声鸣叫和拍浪声中享用午餐。

sentences.english: The birds exploded into the air, all pipes and feathers.
sentences.chinese: 鸟群猛冲上天，鸣叫响成一片，羽毛纷纷飘落。

sentences.english: The wild geese honked high in the autumn sky.
Numerous kinds of insects group themselves and chirrup , in the fields and the golden sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 各类昆虫聚集在金色的阳光下唧唧地鸣叫。

sentences.english: Snow cocks are very sensitive to danger. At sight lf the enemy, they call loudly.
sentences.chinese: 雪鸡对危险很敏感，一看到敌人就大声鸣叫。

sentences.english: The twittering of birds distracted me from sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 小鸟的鸣叫令我睡意全无。

sentences.english: It was filled with the calls of wild birds and the crystal sound of running water in the ravine.
sentences.chinese: 在深谷里到处是野禽鸣叫声和清脆的潺潺流水声。

sentences.english: Scientists produced a mouse that tweets like a bird.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们制造出了一只会象鸟儿一样鸣叫的老鼠。

sentences.english: In a string of shrill hoot of the horn sound, he quickly ran to her.
sentences.chinese: 在一串尖声鸣叫的喇叭声中，他快速地跑向她。

sentences.english: Appropriately enough, Chambers' conviction has spurred a flurry of tweets ridiculing the decision.
sentences.chinese: 恰如其分地，钱伯斯的信念促使了嘲笑决定鸣叫乱舞。

sentences.english: The merry lark warbles in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 那只快乐的百灵鸟在树林里鸣叫。

sentences.english: The chirping has continued through more than eight generations of mice.
sentences.chinese: 这种鸣叫声可以持续遗传八代。

sentences.english: There are small knots of birds frequently hovering and cherupping over the tree .
sentences.chinese: 三三两两的鸟雀不时在榕树上空盘旋鸣叫。

sentences.english: The swallow twitt'ring from the straw-built shed.
sentences.chinese: 草棚里燕子嘁嘁的鸣叫。

sentences.english: Although mockingbirds superbly mimic the songs and calls of many birds.
sentences.chinese: 尽管模仿鸟学很多种鸟的鸣叫声惟妙惟肖。

definition: yelling (sound made by person)/barking/braying/roaring (sound made by animals)
(of animals, the wind etc) to make a mournful sound/whine/moan/wail
to go off like a rocket/to rocket
to whinny (of a horse)/to neigh/to shout
